item.title: TCN
item.description: score:38 Chances: Tricon Residential Inc. has received positive recommendations from leading independent proxy advisory firms ISS and Glass Lewis, indicating strong shareholder support for the company’s plans. The company has announced its consolidated financial results for the three and twelve months ended December 31, 2023, showing positive performance and growth.

item.title: YPF
item.description: score:117 Chances: YPF SA’s plan to divest aging oil fields will free up hundreds of millions of dollars to invest in its shale push in the Vaca Muerta formation. The company has been highlighted in the Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy) value stocks list.
